text: Intumwa y’imana Mussa (iii) ica isubira inyuma kubantu bayo n’ishavu ryinshi n’agahinda kenshi, aca avuga ati:- bantu banje mbega Umuremyi wanyu ntiyabemereye indagano nziza? None iyo ndagano yayo yabaye ndende kuri mwebwe canke mwashatse yuko mumanukirwa n’ishavu rivuye ku Muremyi wanyu, kuri ivyo mwarenze kumasezerano yanje
